name: TextTypeAlignments
shortdesc: The text alignment relative to the path.

property.name: ASCENDER_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: Aligns the ascender to the path &#40;not the path's stroke).

property.name: DESCENDER_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: Aligns descender to the path &#40;not the path's stroke).

property.name: CENTER_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: Aligns the midpoint between the ascender and the descender to the path &#40;not the path's stroke).

property.name: BASELINE_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The text baseline is aligned to the path &#40;not the path's stroke).

property.name: ABOVE_RIGHT_EM_BOX_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The top-edge or right-edge baseline of the em box is aligned to the path.

property.name: BELOW_LEFT_EM_BOX_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The bottom-edge or left-edge baseline of the em box is aligned to the path.

property.name: ABOVE_RIGHT_ICF_BOX_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The ideographic character face box top-edge or right-edge baseline is aligned to the path.

property.name: BELOW_LEFT_ICF_BOX_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
property.shortdesc: The ideographic character face box bottom-edge or left-edge baseline is aligned to the path.
